sentence.Network_en: Why didn't he hold the Yankees instead of everlastingly retreating?
sentence.Network_cn: 他为什么不将北军挡住,反而节节败退 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: " I'm tired of everlastingly being unnatural and never doing anything I want to do.
sentence.Network_cn: " 我再也忍受不了这样无休止地的勉强自己,永远不能赁自己高兴做事.
